name: Time Spike
description:
A short demo/game where you switch between two time periods to solve puzzles, using a tractor beam which can manipulate objects and bring them between times. Made in two days for the Interstellar Game Jam.

Credit to the Cafofo Sci-Fi sound pack for all sound effects in the game: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/sci-fi-sound-pack-154257

All other assets made by me.
